pr_title: [BEAM-10078] uniquify Dataflow specific jars when staging

timeline.message: [BEAM-10078] uniquify Dataflow specific jars when staging
[BEAM-10078] uniquify Dataflow specific jars when staging

timeline.bodyText:
I'm not sure why we need special treatment for Dataflow jars here. Behavior for these jars should be similar for any other jars uploaded for Dataflow IMO.
@lukecwik WDYT ?
timeline.author: chamikaramj

replies.bodyText: Can we add a log statement describing why we need special treatment for these jars ? I see these jars being specifically being referenced to in Dataflow boot.go files.May be that's why ?
replies.author: chamikaramj
